Posts.Content: Yes ma'am. Thank you for your prayers hopefully the biopsy will be negative and I can go on with my life!! Report
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammogram

Posts.Content: I had a mammogram last week and have an appointment for a diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound on both breasts this Friday. In my left breast they found asymmetrical density and in the right a small mass toward my armpit. The wait is killing me. My mother died of breast cancer at 52 and now I'm 40 and have horrible anxiety over this. I had a biopsy of a cyst 10 years ago and it ended up being fibroid. Should I be so worried? 0 likes, 8 replies Report
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammogram

Posts.Content: The only dealing I've ever had is my mother. She was diagnosed at 50 and died at 52. This is why I am worried. Report
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammogram

Posts.Content: Yes ma'am it is! It is so scary and nobody understands how hard it is to stay positive. Thank you for understanding and I will let you know asap Report
Posts.Title: Abnormal mammogram

Posts.Content: Well I went for the mammogram and ultrasound and my BIRAD is 4a which is suspicious but actually good news hopefully. I go Monday to meet with a surgeon about a biopsy but I'm feeling really positive. Report That sounds like great news!!! Please let me know if you need to talk about any of this. This news made my day. You are blessed Report Yes ma'am. Thank you for your prayers hopefully the biopsy will be negative and I can go on with my life!! Report
